description:
As a merchant
  I want to search subscription and check status
name: Search Product Subscription next billing

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Product Index Page
I input '18th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st row of product name should contain '18th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for Checkout","expectText":"18th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of edit button
I should be redirected to Product Edit Page
I click on quantity and pricing tab
I click on subscription toggle
I should see product subscription enabled
I click on update button
I should be redirected to Product Index Page
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input '18th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st product of products list should contain '18th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for CheckoutNT$100","expectText":"18th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
I select country dropdown option included "Taiwan" of country list dropdown
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included "Custom Delivery" of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","(DBW) No integration 711 Pickup","Family Mart Pickup only (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) Family Mart B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) Ezship pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","Family Mart Pickup only (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Custom Delivery","Family Mart Pickup (no integration)","Local Delivery","7-11 Pickup (no integration)","ezship pickup and pay in store"],"text":"Custom Delivery"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select payment dropdown option included "Custom" of payment method dropdown
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I click on proceed to checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I fill new name to name field
I mark the value of name field as variable new name
I fill new email to email address field
I fill phone to contact number field
I click on same as checkbox
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on become member checkbox
I click on place order button
I should be redirected to Shop Order Confirm Page
I mark the value of order confirm info as variable order info

embeddings.data:
"Thank you! Your order has been submitted!
Order No. 20210924074542795
An order confirmation email will be sent to below email:
testuser+532****@shoplineapp.com"

steps.name: I am on Product Subscription Management Page
1st row of product subscription should contain new email

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for Checkout 2021-10-23 30 Sheridan Ziemann (testuser+532886@shoplineapp.com) In Progress 1 Subscription","expectText":"testuser+532886@shoplineapp.com"}

steps.name: I input '18th Product for Checkout' to subscription product search field
1st row of product subscription should contain '18th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for Checkout 2021-10-23 30 Sheridan Ziemann (testuser+532886@shoplineapp.com) In Progress 1 Subscription","expectText":"18th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I input new name to subscription product search field
1st row of product subscription should contain new name

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for Checkout 2021-10-23 30 Sheridan Ziemann (testuser+532886@shoplineapp.com) In Progress 1 Subscription","expectText":"Sheridan Ziemann"}

steps.name: I input order number to subscription product search field
1st row of product subscription should contain new name

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for Checkout 2021-10-23 30 Sheridan Ziemann (testuser+532886@shoplineapp.com) In Progress 1 Subscription","expectText":"Sheridan Ziemann"}

steps.name: 1st row of product subscription should contain '18th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for Checkout 2021-10-23 30 Sheridan Ziemann (testuser+532886@shoplineapp.com) In Progress 1 Subscription","expectText":"18th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: 1st row of product subscription should contain new email

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for Checkout 2021-10-23 30 Sheridan Ziemann (testuser+532886@shoplineapp.com) In Progress 1 Subscription","expectText":"testuser+532886@shoplineapp.com"}

steps.name: ---ROLL BACK---
I am on Product Index Page
I input '18th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st row of product name should contain '18th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for Checkout","expectText":"18th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of edit button
I should be redirected to Product Edit Page
I click on quantity and pricing tab
I click on subscription toggle
I should see product subscription disabled
I click on update button
I should be redirected to Product Index Page
